statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value), MAX(sensor_value), MIN(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50.0 AND sensor_type = 'Pressure' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_count, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;

SELECT device_id, sensor_type, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY max_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_id, location, status FROM devices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT device_name, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices INNER JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id WHERE sensors.sensor_type = 'temperature' AND sensors.sensor_value < 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, value FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM readings WHERE value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM readings GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY max_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type, MAX(value) AS highest_value FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY highest_value DESC
SELECT device_name, location, device_type FROM devices WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01' AND status = 'Active' ORDER BY device_name

SELECT device_name, device_type, COUNT(sensor_id) AS total_sensors FROM devices LEFT JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.sensor_id GROUP BY device_name, device_type ORDER BY total_sensors DESC
SELECT readings.sensor_id, readings.value, sensors.location FROM readings JOIN sensors ON readings.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id WHERE readings.timestamp > '2021-05-01' ORDER BY readings.value ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, status FROM device WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM network WHERE status = 'Connected' ORDER BY network_name;
SELECT log_id, sensor_id, log_timestamp FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = '12345-67890';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_type, status FROM network WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM sensor_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 100;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices JOIN locations ON devices.device_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM monitoring GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_count > 10;
SELECT max(timestamp) as latest_timestamp, sensor_type FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY latest_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'Home';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE longitude > 50 AND latitude < 20;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, min_value, max_value FROM analytics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT monitoring_id, sensor_id, status FROM monitoring WHERE status = 'Alert' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
